solution_line_template: Amanda has gone on {camila_hikes} hikes x {amanda_multiplier} = <<{camila_hikes}*{amanda_multiplier}={amanda_hikes}>>{amanda_hikes} hikes.
Steven has gone on {amanda_hikes} hikes + {steven_additional_hikes} hikes = <<{amanda_hikes}+{steven_additional_hikes}={steven_hikes}>>{steven_hikes} hikes.
Camila needs to go on another {steven_hikes} hikes - {camila_hikes} hikes = <<{steven_hikes}-{camila_hikes}={hikes_camila_needs}>>{hikes_camila_needs} hikes.
Camila will achieve her goal in {hikes_camila_needs} hikes / {hikes_per_week} hikes/week = <<{hikes_camila_needs}/{hikes_per_week}={weeks_to_achieve_goal}>>{weeks_to_achieve_goal} weeks.
